searchDocs.title: runTransaction​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields </> Mailroom:runTransaction(actionsMap: {ActionSet}) → boolean

type ActionSet = {Action}  Run a transaction on a set of snapshots and documents. actionsMap is a map of snapshots or documents to an array of ActionSets to run on them. The actions are applied in the order they are given.
